Rule 110

Rule 110 is one of the simplest Turing-complete cellular automata. This implementation lives on the Ethereum blockchain. Use a browser wallet like MetaMask, Parity, or Mist to evolve an existing game or to create a new one. See the project on GitHub for more information.
